content: I love you all the same, it's just a situation. Don't let it get between what we want, yeah, what we could be. I love you more each day. Sometimes I can't explain it but I feel it and I don't want that to change. I'm just dreaming, I know you're thinking, that the summer left us behind. I'll be waiting, I might be crazy, but I think that it's worth my time.
author: Khai Dreams
